ygData.subject: Spells and more spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I m working on compiling a list of all known Wizard spells, with descriptions and preferrably with notations on the researched spells, plus the cities where
ygData.messageBody:
I'm working on compiling a list of all known Wizard spells, with
descriptions and preferrably with notations on the researched spells,
plus the cities where the spells can bought? Most sites that I've seen
only go up to level 29. And I can't get to Gameznet for some reason...

Basically my goal is to make the most comprehensive list anywhere that
other Wizards will find useful.

If you want to e-mail me the information directly then that would be
fine. I'll make sure to post it as soon as I get enough information.

Thanks in advance.

-Bommer, Gnome Wiz on Fennin
Keeper of Knowledge
